short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to help with efficiency when working with chatbots, such as adding menu items and custom prompts on paste

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover AI Helper—the ultimate productivity tool designed to seamlessly integrate AI into your everyday browsing. Imagine effortlessly summarizing any webpage or instantly selecting key information from any text, then sending it directly to your favorite AI chatbot—all without the hassle of switching tabs or copying and pasting. With AI Helper, your interaction with AI becomes smooth, intuitive, and incredibly time-saving.

But that’s not all. You can also create custom prompts for a truly tailored AI experience. Want to transform highlighted text into a code snippet or a creative story? Simply set up your own custom prompts, and AI Helper will take care of the rest—including automatically clicking the send button for you. It’s like having an intelligent shortcut for all your AI needs, allowing you to get instant responses without lifting a finger.

Currently, AI Helper supports popular AI assistants like ChatGPT, ClaudeAI, and Gemini, with more on the way. Whether you're coding, writing, or just exploring, AI Helper takes your productivity to the next level, letting you harness the power of AI in the most efficient way possible.

You can set custom prompts in options of the extension and select preferred AI that you want to use.

Send commands will appear when right-clicking on any page, prompts will be prepended to your current text selection. After selecting this item selected text will with prepended prompt will be automatically pasted into your chat bot of choice and automatically executed to chat.

Paste commands will appear when right-clicking on an input field of chat bot page, prompts will be prepended to your clipboard content (can be any content!). After selecting this item clipboard content will be prepended with prompt and chat bot will automatically be executed to chat.

If you like the extension and would like to support development of new features you can donate here: https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=F7UP2P46L8HJY
